_hint_: If the language has a formal and an informal way. Then use the informal way.

auth.registration_successful: Registration successful! Please check your email for a verification link.
auth.registration_successful_verify: Registration successful! Please check your email for a verification link.
auth.verification_required: Please verify your email address before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification email.
auth.verify_email_before_login: Please verify your email address before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification email.
auth.session_not_found: User session not found. Cannot display page.
auth.user_not_found: User not found. Cannot display page.
auth.session_not_found_change_password: User session not found. Cannot change password.
auth.password_change_failed: Failed to change password. An unexpected error occurred.
auth.incorrect_old_password: Incorrect old password. Please try again.

verification.success_message: Your email address has been verified. You can now use all features of Beaver Habits.
verification.failed_message: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.
verification.email_sent_to: We've sent a verification email to:
verification.email_sent_generic: We've sent you a verification email.
verification.check_inbox_message: Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.
verification.check_email_address: • Make sure you entered the correct email address
verification.wait_few_minutes: • Wait a few minutes for the email to arrive
verification.request_new_email_below: • Request a new verification email below
verification.enter_email_for_verification: Enter your email address to receive a new verification link.
verification.verification_email_sent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.
verification.error_sending_verification: An error occurred while sending verification email. Please try again.
verification.error_message: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.
verification.check_inbox_instruction: Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.
verification.help_correct_email: • Make sure you entered the correct email address
verification.help_wait: • Wait a few minutes for the email to arrive
verification.help_request_new: • Request a new verification email below
verification.resend_instruction: Enter your email address to receive a new verification link.
verification.email_sent_success: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.
verification.send_error: An error occurred while sending verification email. Please try again.

password_reset.reset_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
password_reset.reset_instructions_sent: If an account with {email} exists, we've sent password reset instructions to that email address.
password_reset.check_inbox_instructions: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email.
password_reset.reset_link_malformed: This password reset link is invalid or malformed.
password_reset.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
password_reset.fill_both_password_fields: Please fill in both password fields
password_reset.password_min_6_chars: Password must be at least 6 characters long
password_reset.password_updated_message: Your password has been updated. You can now log in with your new password.
password_reset.reset_link_expired_message: This password reset link has expired or is invalid. Please request a new one.
password_reset.error_resetting_password: An error occurred while resetting your password
password_reset.error_resetting_try_again: An error occurred while resetting your password. Please try again.
password_reset.error_sending_reset_email: An error occurred while sending the reset email. Please try again.
password_reset.reset_instructions_sent_generic: We've sent password reset instructions to your email address.
password_reset.step_1: 1. Check your email inbox (and spam folder)
password_reset.step_2: 2. Click the reset link in the email
password_reset.step_4: 4. Log in with your new password
password_reset.reset_link_expires: The reset link will expire in 1 hour for security.

forms.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address

notifications.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
notifications.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.

email.registration_thanks: Thank you for registering with {app_name}. To complete your registration and start tracking your habits, please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
email.copy_paste_link: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.verification_expires: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security purposes.
email.ignore_if_not_you: If you didn't create an account with {app_name}, you can safely ignore this email.
email.received_reset_request: We received a request to reset your password for your {app_name} account.
email.click_to_reset: Click the link below to reset your password:
email.reset_expires: This password reset link will expire in 1 hour for security purposes.
email.ignore_if_not_requested: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
email.security_logged: For security reasons, this request was logged with your IP address and timestamp.

verification.welcome_message: Thank you for registering with {app_name}. To complete your registration and start tracking your habits, please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
verification.copy_link_instruction: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.expiry_notice: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security purposes.
verification.ignore_message: If you didn't create an account with {app_name}, you can safely ignore this email.

password_reset.title: Password Reset Request
password_reset.message: We received a request to reset your password for your {app_name} account.
password_reset.instruction: Click the link below to reset your password:
password_reset.visit_link: Visit this link to reset your password:
password_reset.expiry_notice: This password reset link will expire in 1 hour for security purposes.
password_reset.ignore_message: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
password_reset.security_notice: For security reasons, this request was logged with your IP address and timestamp.

settings.only_one_language: Only one language is currently available
